QuestData.Title: Fresh Meat
QuestData.Description: This crater is infested with felfire basilisks.$b$bThey may not be the most cunning of creatures, but they are as vile and dangerous as any demon.$b$bHowever, they may yet prove useful to us. Slay the basilisks, but return to me with chunks of their fel-infused flesh.$b$bI have plans to make use of their freshly carved flesh...
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the Fresh Fel-Flesh I require?
QuestData.RewardText: I see that you have returned with the freshly carved remains of the fel basilisks.$b$bListen closely, and I will explain the purpose behind retrieving them...
